column4: Hi! I'm having a weird java problem and I'm new to ubuntu... can anyone help? When I use Windows XP on my computer, java heavy sites like Gmail and Facebook work just fine, but when I use Ubuntu, those sites are as slow as molasses. I have the latest version of Firefox as well as Ubuntu 8.10. Also, I apparently have the latest java but when I try to verify if my computer's java works on www.java.com nothing loads in the test box.  Sorry if I'm
first, java does not equal javascript
